Source.Name: network-manager
Source.Description: NetworkManager is a set of co-operative tools that make networking simple and straightforward. Whether WiFi, wired, 3G, or Bluetooth, NetworkManager allows you to quickly move from one network to another: once a network has been configured and joined once, it can be detected and re-joined automatically the next time it's available.

Package.Name: network-manager-iwd
Package.Summary: Installing this will switch to using iwd as the wifi backend in place of wpa_supplicant
